item.description:
All members of this group are welcome, whether or not they are Reiki practitioners. But if you have flu or a cold, please wait till you are over it. This is to facilitate healing, so we don't want anyone to catch any "bugs"!

It's a good idea to check for last minute cancellations. If less than 3 people RSVP "yes", there will be no Meetup.

Following the hands-on session, members are welcome to remain to join in with another group arriving by 7:00 PM to view and discuss a DVD on Advanced Energy Healing.

Pristine pure well water will be provided, but please bring refreshments if you want something to munch on.

Please do NOT go up the driveway with the "ULCS Clinic" sign. Instead go up the first driveway with the "Meetup" sign. It's not hard to find, but for directions call 603-286-8191.

Thanks, and I look forward to seeing you! Aalia

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: Free Reiki Share & Advanced Energy Healing Discussion
